edu.salleurl.profile

Class Profile

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.salleurl.profile.Profile

  • public class Profile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class able to generate an HTML profile of any class implementing the Profileable interface, alongside some extra data.

    This class should only be instantiated by using the ProfileFactory class.

    Almost all public methods of this class return the object they're called on, for chaining purposes.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    DPOO 20-21 Team

      Method that adds extra information to that a profile can show.
      Profile addLanguage(java.lang.String language)
      Method that adds a language to the language list a profile can show.
      Profile setCountry(java.lang.String country)
      Setter for one of the extra fields a profile can describe: a country of origin.
      Profile setFlagUrl(java.lang.String flagUrl)
      Setter for one of the extra fields a profile can describe: a picture of a flag.
      Profile setProfileable(Profileable profileable)
      Setter for the main entity a profile can describe, a Profileable.
      void write()
      Method that writes the profile's contents to its HTML file.
      void writeAndOpen()
      Method that writes the profile's contents to its HTML file and opens it in the system's default application.
